alert.note: Alert for Walsh (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 7:24PM CDT until April 19 at 4:46PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in North Dakota... Forest River at Minto affecting Walsh County. .Snowmelt river flooding to continue. Rate of rise and ultimate crest is uncertain due to rate of ongoing snowmelt runoff and possible rain and colder temperatures in the forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT UNTIL WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Forest River at Minto. * WHEN...Until Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, MODERATE FLOOD. During high flow, river may bypass Minto to the south and flow into Lake Ardoch. Urban flooding begins. Possible break up ice jam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 5.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late this evening to a crest of 8.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
